mutants.original_line: permissions = re.findall(r'distributed under the License(.*?)governing permissions', license_text, re.DOTALL)
mutants.code:
import re

def analyze_license(license_text):
    permissions = re.findall('', license_text, re.DOTALL)
    limitations = re.findall('WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND(.*?)either express or implied', license_text, re.DOTALL)
    permissions = [permission.strip() for permission in permissions]
    limitations = [limitation.strip() for limitation in limitations]
    return {'permissions': permissions, 'limitations': limitations}

import re

def analyze_license(license_text):
    permissions = re.findall('distributed under the License(.*?)governing permissions', license_text, re.DOTALL)
    limitations = re.findall('WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND(.*?)either express or implied', license_text, re.DOTALL)
    permissions = [permission.strip() for permission in permissions]
    limitations = [limitation.strip() for limitation in limitations]
    return {'permissions': permissions, '': limitations}
